A graphics accelerator is an additional processor used to improve performance
both in video and graphics processing and in tasks requiring multi-threaded
arithmetic calculations. Initially, dedicated servers provided rendering of
images to display a realistic picture on the monitor due to the imposition and
processing of a large number of textures and accelerated ray tracing.

In servers, a graphics accelerator speeds up running applications by helping
the CPU perform arithmetic operations. Such accelerators often do not have
their own interfaces for displaying images at all, but thanks to
virtualization technologies, such as NVIDIA GRID, for example, they allow
serving entire farms with end-user applications or accelerating the
construction of 3D models in professional CAD/CAM systems. Graphics
accelerators are of great help in artificial intelligence tasks, training
neural networks and deep machine learning.

## Features of using servers with video cards

Not so long ago, the CPU was responsible for performing all the operations on
a personal computer. Thanks to the central processor, video card requests were
processed and calculations were made. But the obvious problem with the delay
of all procedures did not allow us to work as productively as possible. The
processor power was not enough for several operations at the same time.

New programs and applications have provoked the emergence of discrete and
integrated video cards. For high-speed tasks, servers with a video card are
used, they provide Graphic Processor Unit (gpu server) processors. They are
often called a video processor or an accelerator, which indicates the direct
functionality of the GPU.

## Where are GPU servers used?

Experts boldly say that it was a dedicated server with a video card that
provoked a rapid turn in the IT field. Entire corporations and large firms use
technology in different areas. Initially, such systems were needed to work
with graphics of a complex format. But high performance indicators made it
possible to use servers with a video card to calculate data.

What is the picture today? Servers with gpu are actively used in the following
areas:

  * CUDA Computing and Research;
  * development of applications, games, simulators;
  * testing;
  * calculations and prognostic constructions;
  * 3D modeling;
  * design;
  * mining;
  * rendering;
  * transcoding;
  * analysis of cryptocurrencies, construction of cryptographic schemes.

It is worth noting that GPU servers are also used in the field of artificial
intelligence, as well as in the security service to protect data.

## Advantages and disadvantages of servers with a video card

Now let's look at the main pros and cons of servers with a video card. The
main advantages are definitely worth mentioning:

  1. A distinctive characteristic is stability in operation even under heavy loads, therefore, there is no downtime.
  2. Data is processed quickly.
  3. GPU technology works quickly.
  4. It has basic protection, protects against attacks and data loss.
  5. Individual settings. At the request of the client, a configuration is performed to optimize resources and select the required capacity.

There are two main disadvantages: high price and the need to use it together
with the CPU. As you can see, there are much more pluses, which indicates the
relevance of using a gpu server. Servers with a video card have taken an
important place in the work of large organizations, and the further, the wider
the range of use of the GPU becomes. Now even small firms developers need to
use such servers.

Why our server is perfect

We are trying to be perfect at all

  * SuperHard! 

We use only our own, proven equipment of the latest generation from the
world's leading manufacturers.

  * You are special 

If you rent dedicated server for a long term – we will regularly make you a
special offers and discounts.

  * Admin is always near 

We are ready to provide you with full twenty-four-hour administration of your
server regardless of the selected tariff.

  * Free transfer 

If you need to transfer to us your project from another server, we’ll do it
for free with pleasure.

  * Speed is over the top 

Our servers run on the ports with a speed of 1 Gbps. Your sites will load
almost instantly.

No. Just in a heartbeat

  * Disks 

All our drives are exclusively NVMe & SSD (Intel DC) with RAID 10 data
protection technology for ultra-reliable data retention.

  * Your server - your rules 

Choose any operating system which is convenient for you to work with.

We'll install it to your server.

  * Full control 

We have a large selection of control panels, including free ones. Determine
the most comfortable one for yourself and manage the server with the rights of
an administrator.

  * Like at hand 

We provide you with an IPMI panel for free, which allows you to monitor the
status of all physical components of the server, even when it is turned off.

How to choose the most suitable tariff for yourself?

As easy as ABC. Please contact our manager, he will ask you a number of
guiding question - and select the most optimal solution for you. We have
specially created a wide range of tariffs to meet the maximum spectrum of
customer needs.

Are your services completely official?

Our business is legal and officially documented down to the last chip. We work
in full compliance with the legislation of the European Union, Russia and
Moldova.

Who will be able to access my information?

Only the circle of persons you define yourself. In addition to this list, no
one else will be able to access your information - this is guaranteed by the
protection of data centers, our IT security department and, of course, by the
law.

Refund policy

We refund the money if the service is not provided in full, but only after
filling out an application, where user verification is required by means of
presenting a copy of passport and completing an application.

Perfect – means ideal

We try to be perfect in everything

  * Perfect Places 

A large variety of locations - the best servers in reliable data centers in
Moldova, Netherlands, Russia, USA, Latvia, Ukraine, Hong Kong, Germany,
Canada, Slovakia, Czechia, Great Britain, Israel, Turkey, Poland, Bulgaria,
Romania, Italy, Finland, Hungary, Portugal, Sweden, Switzerland, Kazakhstan,
Serbia, Ireland, France, Spain, Greece, Lithuania, Estonia, Denmark, Austria,
Norway and Belgium

  * Perfect Hard 

We use strictly our own, proven high quality equipment.

All discs are NVMe.

  * Perfect Soft 

Licensed software according to your choice, KVM virtualization, user-friendly
control panels, we are members of the RIPE NCC, with LIR status and IP
addresses.

  * Perfect Service 

Widest breadth of payment methodsand payment currencies, regular
promotions,discounts and individual tariff (if necessary).

  * Perfect Speed 

Technical support processes any request as quickly as possible, within half an
hour. Many processes are automated.

Your server will be available almost immediately after ordering.

  * Perfect Cost 

We have meticulously developed tariffs with an ideal price-quality ratio. In
addition, we promise to delight you regularly with pleasant promotions and
discounts.

More than 35 000 clients

successfully use our perfect servers

News companies

Stay up to date with the latest news and events!

09.10.2023

Technical work and maximum speed - 10 Gbit/s now in the USA

We inform you about the upcoming migration of the data center to the USA -
PQ.Hosting servers are moving to the new Evoque Secaucus data center. After
the move, the speed of the port in the United States will be increased from 1
Gbps to high-speed 10 Gbps.

More

04.09.2023

Maximum speed - 10 Gbps now in England!

Most recently, we announced an increase in port speed in Germany and decided
not to stop there. We are proud to announce another cool update - we have
increased the speed of the port in England to 10 Gbps!

More

01.09.2023

More powerful, faster and more affordable - 10 Gbps in Germany

We will not languish with our cool news! We have increased the speed of the
port in Germany - now you have at your disposal not the usual 1 Gbps , but a
high-speed 10 Gbps!
